hero.headline:
Our Clothing Shop
HanStyle Bright Store
hero.subtext: Modern sensibility meets the timeless beauty of tradition

story.title: Brand Story
story: Our creations go beyond being worn – they become the beginning of expressing one’s identity for both the wearer and the beholder.
That beginning is the most beautiful way of self-expression, and those colors together weave into a culture shared by individuals and communities.
HanGage does not create fast fashion or capital-driven replicas. We craft garments that hold the unique colors and stories of each nation and individual.

store.title: Store Information
store.address: 2F, 206-207, Jungang Shopping Mall, 70 Taepyeong 3-gil, Wansan-gu, Jeonju, Jeonbuk
